directions.step:
Mix all ingredients. Ferment under fermentation lock. Rack when fermentation slows & sediment forms in bottom of jug. Allow fermentation to finish & rock until wine is clear. Age as long as possible. Normally drinkable after 3 months, better after 6 months, outstanding after 12 months. Makes a medium dry wine. For a sweet wine, use 4 cups of sugar.
COL R.M. SINGLETARY
